item.title: Brenda Siegel for governor 2022
item.description: Brenda Siegel for governor About Brenda Brenda was born in Brattleboro, Vermont. She graduated from Brattleboro Union High School and after college, she worked as a teacher, political intern, and choreographer. In 2002, she became a single mom and decided to open a small business and raise her child in Vermont near her own family. Brendaâ€™s father was a commercial photographer and small business owner. Her mother was a dancer and is an American Sign language interpreter.
